titles.title: No FED in West Texas Act
No FED in West Texas Act
No Federal Expansion Designation in West Texas Act
To prohibit the implementation of a Land Protection Plan for Muleshoe National Wildlife Refuge.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Water, Wildlife and Fisheries.
Subcommittee on Water, Wildlife and Fisheries Discharged
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held
Ordered to be Reported (Amended) by the Yeas and Nays: 23 - 16.
Reported (Amended) by the Committee on Natural Resources. H. Rept. 119-435.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 374.
